t:
“NO, we can't be together, you need to get over me,” my girlfriend screamed.



I tightened the ropes —
she needs to understand
that we are meant to be
together, forever.
c:
Inspired by a friend's story.



#breakup #kidnap #captured #together #forever #forced #deny #revenge





Disclaimer: No one was harmed in the making of this story. No one will be harmed in future.
